item.title: Realy bad problem!
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Go into ur player.java which is server sided and search for :

you will see something like this

public boolean inWild() { if(inFunPk()) { return true; } if(absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3966 || absX > 3343 && absX < 3384 && absY > 9619 && absY < 9660 || absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 9918 && absY < 10366){ return true; } return false; }
This part is where it says what area is wildy.
if(absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3966 ||
absX > 3343 && absX < 3384 && absY > 9619 && absY < 9660 ||
absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 9918 && absY < 10366){

Simply change the coords or delete them
hope i helped
